function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of standardization of protocols and networks for urban technology","Impact":"Incompatible data from sensors across regions, hindering disaster preparedness","Mitigation":"Standardize protocols and networks for data compatibility","Technologies":"IoT systems, data integration platforms","People":"Engineers, urbanists, policy makers","Owner":"International architectural and urban institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate disaster management policy","Impact":"Ineffective disaster response and recovery, leading to loss of life and infrastructure","Mitigation":"Develop and implement comprehensive disaster management policies","Technologies":"Disaster response systems, risk assessment tools","People":"Government, community","Owner":"Policy makers, disaster management authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of disease propagation in disaster-affected areas","Impact":"Increased risk of disease outbreaks and public health crises","Mitigation":"Implement sanitation and hygiene measures, establish healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Monitoring systems, medical equipment","People":"Disaster-affected populations, relief workers","Owner":"Health authorities, relief organizations"}]}
